Title: Furnished 2 bedrooms Basement Apartment - Richmond Hill
Description:
Looking for a comfortable and well-equipped living space in a prime location? Look no further than this Bright and Spacious Basement Apartment in Oak Ridges, Richmond Hill. This lovely 2-bedroom apartment is located at the intersection of Bathurst and Bloomington, offering easy access to amenities, transportation, parks, schools, and much more.
The apartment features a 1st bedroom with a queen bed, side table, and closet and a 2nd bedroom with a queen bed, side table, wardrobe, writing table, and chair. The living/dining room is furnished with a couch, dining table, and chairs, while the kitchen comes equipped with a refrigerator and stove. The apartment also includes a 3-piece bathroom, shared laundry facility, and separate entrance.
Enjoy fast access to YRT, GO, 404/400, and other major highways.
The monthly rent of $2150 includes all utilities (hydro-electricity, water, gas – heating, air conditioning), high-speed internet Wi-Fi, and 1 parking spot. Smoking and pets are not allowed. The apartment is available from March 15th, 2024, or immediate occupancy.
This apartment is perfect for a young couple, small family, or student.
To schedule a viewing, please call at 647-686-9337.

Title: 833 Kennedy Road - Helen Towers Apartment for Rent
Description: Situated in a family-oriented area of Scarborough, Helen Towers is a wonderful rental community located close to several schools, a childcare centre, a community centre, public library, and shopping. Your home backs onto Treverton Park – the perfect place to walk your dog or take the kids to the playground. There is a grocery store and a Shoppers Drug Mart just steps away on Eglinton Avenue East. The TTC stops outside your door and The Kennedy subway station, the Kennedy GO station, and Scarborough RT are a short walk away – making all parts of Toronto and the GTA easily accessible.All the shopping and entertainment options of Eglinton Town Centre and Eglinton Square are minutes away as well. Centennial College Ashtonbee Campus, Ashtonbee Reservoir Park, Wexford Park and nature trails are all close by.Your bright and spacious, pet-friendly rental apartment features gleaming parquet floors and a private balcony. Title: Looking for a Female Roommate in a 3 bed, 2 Wash apartment
Description:
Hello everyone,
I am looking for a third roommate (female only) in a 3 bedroom and 2 washroom apartment.
The move in date is April 1st 2024 and first and last month’s deposit is required before moving in
You will have your own room (unfurnished) and access to all the common areas (Kitchen, and Living/dining room) and will share the bathroom with one other person (female).
There is a laundry room on every other floor of the building with 2 washers and 2 dryers on each floor.
The building is close to Glencairn station and you can get there by a 7 min bus ride. Davisville station is a 12 min bus ride away. Yonge and Eglinton can be reached by a 15 min bus ride as well.
A new Metrolinx station is scheduled to open this year which would be an 8 min walk away.
The main intersection close to the building is Bathurst and Roselawn.
The numbers:
Rent: $623 (subject to increase once every year as determined by the Province which has been between 2.5 to 5% in the past years)
Hydro: $20 to $30 per person depending on usage (the building does not have AC but heat and water is included in the rent)
Internet: $31 per person (Bell unlimited Fibe 1 gig)
Underground Parking can be arranged with the building for $100

Located in the Keelesdale neighbourhood, this is a boutique, 6 unit Toronto apartment building. Ideal for one or two professional working couple. Apts include two separate entrances front and back. Steps to the NEW Keelesdale subway station, minutes to Yorkdale Shopping mall, cafes, shops, restaurants, and easy access to the downtown core. New and reimagined design elements assure warm and welcoming spaces, maintained to the highest standard. Suite offerings at this location include 1 bedroom units. Apartments are fully renovated with careful attention to quality and detail. All units are equipped with a full range of high-end appliances and air conditioning, Complemented by superior fixtures and finishes.
Community Within close walking distance, you will conveniently find grocery stores, several bakeries, cafes, restaurants, and medical centres. This building is located on a quiet street, and has the convenience of Keelesdale Subway Station, within 2 minutes walking distance, as well as 24 hour busses running along Eglinton Avenue. There is also access to all major highways. If you are searching for parks, the Keelesdale Parks are just to the west where you can stroll along Black Creek and enjoy nature in the city.

Description: Situated in a family-oriented area of Scarborough, 831 Kennedy Helen Towers is a wonderful rental community located close to several schools, a childcare centre, a community centre, public library, and shopping. Your home backs onto Treverton Park – the perfect place to walk your dog or take the kids to the playground. There is a grocery store and a Shoppers Drug Mart just steps away on Eglinton Avenue East. The TTC stops outside your door and The Kennedy subway station, the Kennedy GO station, and Scarborough RT are a short walk away – making all parts of Toronto and the GTA easily accessible. Title: St. Andrews Towers East - 2 Bedroom Apartment for Rent

With subway and highway access, it's an ideal location for the commuter. Nestled among multi-million dollar homes, it's a refined community and the ideal spot for apartment living. Title: 831 Kennedy Road - 831 Kennedy Apartment for Rent
Description: Situated in a family-oriented area of Scarborough, 831 Kennedy Helen Towers is a wonderful rental community located close to several schools, a childcare centre, a community centre, public library, and shopping. Your home backs onto Treverton Park – the perfect place to walk your dog or take the kids to the playground. There is a grocery store and a Shoppers Drug Mart just steps away on Eglinton Avenue East. The TTC stops outside your door and The Kennedy subway station, the Kennedy GO station, and Scarborough RT are a short walk away – making all parts of Toronto and the GTA easily accessible. All the shopping and entertainment options of Eglinton Town Centre and Eglinton Square are minutes away as well. Centennial College Ashtonbee Campus, Ashtonbee Reservoir Park, Wexford Park and nature trails are all close by.Your bright and spacious, pet-friendly rental apartment features gleaming parquet floors and a private balcony. Enjoy the convenience of on-site laundry facilities, plenty of visitor parking, and parking available for you. Experience the peace of mind that comes with monitored security cameras and a friendly on-site management team – there to handle any maintenance issues that may arise. Helen Towers is a Certified Rental Building.If you're looking for a comfortable, convenient, and family-friendly place to call home, you can stop searching. Helen Towers (831  Kennedy Road) is ready to welcome you. Title: 200 Dufferin Street - Lord Dufferin Apartments Apartment for Ren
Description: Lord Dufferin Apartments offers stylish, renovated apartments in Liberty Village's west end. Packed with must-have on-site amenities and boasting a transit score of 100, these apartments will help you enhance your Toronto living experience. Offering pet friendly bachelor, 1 and 2 bedroom suites, you'll love the earthy tones and contemporary finishes outfitting these cozy apartments. The rental suites at Lord Dufferin Apartments feature dishwashers, balconies, and open-concept layouts, while our friendly on-site management and concierge staff address your maintenance needs and secure your peace of mind. Residents also enjoy a gym, laundry facilities, storage room with lockers, and party room all on-site; while just outside you'll find a cozy swimming pool and lounge area, plus a personal dog park for resident use. There's no shortage of amenities in Liberty Village, and Lord Dufferin Apartments puts you walking distance from some of its best. Take your workout outdoors with the paved path along Lake Ontario just steps from your door, or spend a day at the CNE, just as close by. With TTC bus and streetcar stops at your door, including 24-hour options on Queen Street, easy access to the Gardiner Expressway and QEW, and the Exhibition GO Station just minutes away, the entire city of Toronto is at your fingertips. Lord Dufferin Apartments is a Certified Rental Building and offers affordable rental living in the heart of one of Toronto's most vibrant neighbourhoods. Live at the edge of one of Toronto's most vibrant neighbourhoods, Liberty Village! The Lord Dufferin is ideal for anyone who enjoys convenience. Title: 31 Spencer Ave - 31 Spencer Ave Apartment for Rent
Description: Your rental community at 31 Spencer Avenue is located steps from Liberty Village – one of the hippest neighbourhoods in Toronto. You are right next to all the trendsetting shops and boutiques, restaurants and pubs, but tucked away on a quiet tree-lined street surrounded by lovely Victorian brick homes. Grab groceries with ease on foot at Longo's Liberty Village. Schools are within walking distance and the 501 Streetcar makes getting downtown a snap. Need some nature in your life? The greatest greenspace in the city is nearby. Spend your leisure time exploring the trails or watching the ducks swim in High Park.Your freshly-renovated rental apartment is pet-friendly and features a designer-inspired kitchen with quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. You'll love the convenience of the community's on-site laundry facilities. Relax and unwind on your private balcony. Live a stress-free lifestyle thanks to our on-site management team that can quickly deal with any maintenance issues you may have. Never worry about finding parking or scraping snow off your car thanks to your assigned underground parking spot.If you're looking for a comfortable and peaceful place to call home with the convenience and excitement of the city all around you, you're looking for 31 Spencer Avenue. Located in the heart of hip Parkdale, near Liberty Village, your new neighbourhood is packed with trendy shops, bars, boutiques, and incredible restaurants. King Street West and Queen Street West are close at hand, so you'll never be bored. The 501 Queen & 504 King streetcars run 24/7, so you'll never be inconvenienced. Commuting from 31 Spencer Avenue is a piece of cake as we are minutes from the Gardiner Expressway and a speedy 10-minute streetcar ride to the center of downtown Toronto. The area boasts great private schools, public schools and Catholic schools, as well as many recreation facilities. BMO Field and Allan Lamport Stadium are within walking distance, so sports fans will have plenty of reason to celebrate. If you like to party, you'll love the nightlife in the area, you're within easy walking distance of Parts and Labour, The Drake Hotel and The Gladstone -- just to name a few local hotspots. When you need a healthy dose of nature, we are close to some of Toronto's best parks including High Park, Trinity Bellwoods, and the waterfront parks Marilyn Bell Park and Budapest Park.Building OverivewYour rental community at 31 Spencer Avenue is located steps from Liberty Village – one of the hippest neighbourhoods in Toronto. Title: Sherbourne Complex - 1 Bedroom Apartment for Rent
Description: Recently renovated one bedroom, two bedroom and three bedroom suites surround you in comfort and style, while onsite management and security staff ensure you're taken care of, 24/7. Getting out to enjoy the great neighbourhood, there are a wide variety of restaurants, a grocery, on-site pharmacy, and plenty of great shopping. The hospital, U of T, Ryerson and George Brown, as well as several public and secondary schools are also in the area.

Title: Northshore Apartments - 1 Bedroom Apartment for Rent
Description: Toronto's west end has seen an incredible resurgence and the popularity of renting in this lakefront community is undeniable. Within walking distance to the west beach and boardwalk and with a clear view of the lake, Northshore offers a great mid-rise rental building to enjoy this community and lifestyle. From paddleboarding, rowing and taking in some sunshine to long walks, rollerblading and biking along the Martin Goodman Trail and even a romantic sunset, the waterfront is a huge draw. But that's not all this area has. Stylish new shops, delicious new restaurants and some great new nightlife have infused the west end with vibrancy. The area is trendy and these bright, roomy apartments are the ideal rentals for this lifestyle.

Title: 2 bedroom 2 bathroom
Description:
Hello everyone‍♀️
We're renting out our 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in Downtown due to relocation.
Price is $3200 (includes parking and locker).
The area is really cool (and most importantly, very quiet for Toronto). You get the downtown vibe but in a peaceful setting. It's on Logan Street, surrounded by private houses, lots of cafes, restaurants, and great transportation options.
The balcony offers a view of the CN Tower and the entire city.
The building is brand new, we're the first occupants, everything is in perfect condition. Parking and locker are included in the price. There's a gym, coworking space, barbecue area, and outdoor relaxation zone.
Two bedrooms, one master bedroom (with ensuite bathroom), and the other separate from the bathroom. Can be used as a bedroom or office, whatever you prefer.
Landlords are great, quick to respond to any questions or requests, and hands-off if everything is okay
If you want to see the apartment, message me privately.
You'll need to pay the first and last month's rent. Of course, you need to be employed and provide at least two paystubs, a letter from your employer, and a credit score report.

Title: Newly Built 2Bedroom Stack Town at high demand Bayview and Finch
Address: Finch Avenue East, North York, ON
Description:
Moving in by May 1! This stunning two-bedroom, two-bathroom townhouse apartment offers unparalleled privacy as the end unit. Spanning two stories, it boasts soaring 9-foot ceilings throughout and expansive windows in each bedroom, flooding the space with natural light. The basement features two ensuite bedrooms, while the main floor includes a versatile den that can serve as a dining room or third bedroom, alongside a modern kitchen and inviting living room.
The kitchen showcases upgraded designer Italian-manufactured cabinetry, while the bathrooms feature contemporary Italian-manufactured vanities with premium porcelain slab countertops, upgraded shower ceilings, and sleek frameless doors. Both bedrooms offer ensuite bathrooms and walk-in closets, ensuring comfort and convenience.
Included with the apartment is underground parking. Situated in the vibrant Willowdale East neighborhood, residents enjoy proximity to cultural amenities such as the Toronto Centre for the Performing Arts, Mel Lastman Square, the Douglas Snow Aquatic Centre, movie theaters, the North York Public Library, and two subway stations.
Includes: Stainless Steel Fridge, Stove, B/I Dishwasher, Built-In Microwave, Washer, Dryer. All Elf's, Window Coverings. Tenants agree to the report to the Landlord Credit Bureau and for landlord to verify the credit and background information. Tenants are responsible for all utilities. Required: The Rental App, Full Credit Report, References, Letter of Employment, Pay stubs, 1st And Last, key deposit. Certified Deposit + Post Dated Cheques, No Smokers and pets. Aaa Tenants Only!

Title: 200 Dufferin Street - Furnished 1 Bedroom Suite at Lord Dufferin
Description: Lord Dufferin Apartments offers stylish, renovated apartments in Liberty Village's west end. Packed with must-have on-site amenities and boasting a transit score of 100, these apartments will help you enhance your Toronto living experience. Offering pet friendly bachelor, 1 and 2 bedroom suites, you'll love the earthy tones and contemporary finishes outfitting these cozy apartments. The rental suites at Lord Dufferin Apartments feature dishwashers, balconies, and open-concept layouts, while our friendly on-site management and concierge staff address your maintenance needs and secure your peace of mind. Residents also enjoy a gym, laundry facilities, storage room with lockers, and party room all on-site; while just outside you'll find a cozy swimming pool and lounge area, plus a personal dog park for resident use. There's no shortage of amenities in Liberty Village, and Lord Dufferin Apartments puts you walking distance from some of its best. Take your workout outdoors with the paved path along Lake Ontario just steps from your door, or spend a day at the CNE, just as close by. With TTC bus and streetcar stops at your door, including 24-hour options on Queen Street, easy access to the Gardiner Expressway and QEW, and the Exhibition GO Station just minutes away, the entire city of Toronto is at your fingertips. Lord Dufferin Apartments is a Certified Rental Building and offers affordable rental living in the heart of one of Toronto's most vibrant neighbourhoods. Title: Spacious 2+1 Bedroom Apartment for rent in Downtown Toronto
Amenities: Gym, Concierge, 24 Hour Security, Bicycle Parking, Elevator in Building
Description:
**Seeking Two Female Roommates for Prime Downtown Toronto Apartment**
I am currently looking for two female working professionals or students to share a spacious 2-bedroom +1 Den apartment in the heart of Toronto's Entertainment and Theatre District, located at the intersection of Blue Jays Way & King St W. This is a unique opportunity for those who appreciate modern living in a vibrant urban setting.
**Apartment Features:**
- **Location:** Situated on the 6th floor, the apartment offers beautiful south-facing views and is flooded with natural light.
- **Bedrooms:** Two well-appointed bedrooms, each offering privacy and comfort.
- **Bathrooms:** Includes two full bathrooms, ensuring convenience for all residents.
- **Kitchen & Living Area:** An open-concept layout with a fully equipped kitchen featuring high-end built-in appliances, leading into a spacious living and dining area.
- **Amenities:** The building boasts a range of luxury amenities including 24/7 concierge, a fully equipped gym, co-working space, outdoor BBQ area, and more.
**Neighborhood Highlights:**
- **Convenience:** Steps away from public transportation, Rogers Centre, Scotiabank Arena, various theatres, banks, shops, bars, and restaurants.
- **Lifestyle:** Located in a lively area known for its entertainment options, offering easy access to Toronto's best cultural and social scenes.
**Lease Details:**
- **Availability:** Immediate, with flexible viewing times available upon request. 1 year lease agreement at least.
- **Requirements:** Ideal candidates will be non-smokers and ready to provide documentation such as a credit report, employment verification, and references. A $300 key deposit is required upon signing.
**Interested?**
For more information or to arrange a viewing, please contact Rida at rida.zahraslam@gmail.com. Alternatively, feel free to direct message your phone number, and I will reach out to you.
This is a fantastic opportunity for those looking to enjoy downtown Toronto living with all the comforts and conveniences of a modern home. Looking forward to finding the perfect roommates to share this amazing space with!

Title: 165 Jameson Ave - 165 Jameson Ave Apartment for Rent
Description: Welcome to 165 Jameson Avenue, located in trendy Parkdale near Liberty Village. Your new community is packed with specialty shops, great restaurants, bars, and boutiques. There are public schools, private schools, and Catholic schools nearby and the 501 streetcar and the 24 -hour Queen Street streetcar easily connects you to downtown Toronto in minutes. Enjoy easy access to the Gardiner Expressway if you prefer to commute by car. Your home is a short walk away from the fabulous galleries and nightlife of Queen West, the trendsetting shops of Liberty Village, and the impressive restaurants of Roncesvalles Village. The CNE, BMO Field and Allan Lamport Stadium are all near your new neighbourhood. When you need to recharge in nature, stroll on the waterfront trail along Lake Ontario to High Park – the largest park in the city.Your bright and modern rental apartment features sleek kitchens with subway tile and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Relax after a long day, or get up early and watch the sunrise on your private balcony. Laundry facilities are located on-site and you'll never have to hunt for a parking space, or scrape ice off of your car, thanks to our underground parking area. Our friendly on-site management team will handle any maintenance issues, in the building or in your suite, quickly and professionally.Your new home at 165 Jameson Avenue offers you the comfort, convenience and style of city living at its best. Welcome to the next chapter of your story. Located in trendy Parkdale, near Liberty Village, your new neighbourhood is packed with chic and fun shops, bars, boutiques, specialty stores and excellent restaurants. Our property is conveniently located just a 10-second walk to the 24-hour Queen Street streetcar which will help you zip across town with ease. Commuting from here is hassle-free as we are minutes from the Gardiner Expressway and a mere 10-minute streetcar ride to the center of downtown Toronto. The fabulous galleries, shops and restaurants of Queen West are just five minutes away and you're only 10 minutes from the charming shops and restaurants of Roncesvalles Village. If you have children, you'll be pleased to learn that the area boasts private schools, public schools and Catholic schools, as well as many recreation facilities. Sports fans will love being close to BMO Field and Allan Lamport Stadium. You'll never be bored as the CNE, home to countless fun festivals, shows and events, is also only minutes away. There's a vibrant nightlife scene in the area with beloved Toronto landmarks like The Drake Hotel, Parts and Labour and The Gladstone located nearby. Nature lovers will appreciate that we are close to some of the city's best parks including High Park, Trinity Bellwoods, and the waterfront greenspaces of Marilyn Bell Park and Budapest Park.Building OverivewWelcome to 165 Jameson Avenue, located in trendy Parkdale near Liberty Village. Title: 665 Roselawn Avenue - Terrace Gardens Apartment for Rent
Description: Terrace Gardens is an intimate, 5-storey rental community situated in Forest Hill – one of the most desirable and sought-after neighbourhoods in the city. This area is known as one of the best school districts in Toronto – with several exceptional schools nearby, for every stage of education. But schools are just one of this neighbourhood's many strengths. Your home is located close to parks and is just steps from the extensive Beltline Nature Trail. All the shopping and entertainment you could want awaits you only minutes away at Yonge and Eglinton. The TTC stops outside your door and Eglington subway station is close by. Grocery stores, fruit markets and restaurants are within 10mins walking distance. The flat is already nicely decorated with pretty European furniture. The vacant room(350sq/ft) with big windows. Everything included: hydro, gas, water and unlimited high speed fibre internet.
Terry, Shayne and Adrianna are friendly, excellent people to live w/. Terry is a buyer who loves climbing, cycling, movies, drawing and fashion. Shayne works at Real Sports, he is quiet and he likes video games and hockey. Adrianna is an Architect, she is currently back to school. After living w/ them for a while, I'm quite sad to leave them. Though I do hope to help them find a great flatmate!

Title: Short term $3900 Furnished 3 Bedroom College & Bathurst
Description:
Available date : April 1st. 2024
Rent for April & May is $3900 per month.
No wait for crowded elevators!
This newly renovated 3-bedroom apartment with a great mix of modern and traditional styles.
Conveniently located in downtown, 15 mins walk to U of T. 10 mins to Annex & Korean town,
10 minutes walk to Chinatown, 15 mins walk to Queen st west. Grocery store, Fresh CO. is 5 mins walk.
Super comfortable in-floor heating throughout, two skylights, a gas fireplace and the latest in accent lighting.
The apartment is also has Energy exchange system installed. The system can turn hot air into cold air which is the AC in the summer, then it can turn cold air into hot air for the winter.
The apartment has touchscreen door locks which allowing you to go keys FREE!!
The apartment is full of modern conveniences but warm and bright with exposed brick and reclaimed wood stairs, fireplace mantle, and sliding barn door by local artist Lubo Design.
The living room is fitted with a 50" flat screen TV. Beautiful century old exposed brick from Toronto’s famous Brickworks spans the entire length of the second floor.
The kitchen features brand new stainless steel appliances with a west-looking window overlooking the verdant backyard and laneway behind the house.
The second floor bedroom has a full size bed and French doors that open to the deck where you can enjoy the peace and greenery of the backyard. All bedrooms have room-darkening blinds when you need some sleep.
The two dormer bedrooms on the 3rd floor have queen sized beds and a cottage in the city feel.
Both bedrooms have spacious closets.
The high-speed Internet is also included in the rent price.
WiFi is Fiberoptic 1.5 Gbps total download speed Internet with super low ping (fast response).
The wifi and Netflix are included in the rent.
Requirement : Application, first & last month rent, Credit score check, employment letter, references.
Bedding could be included, depends on the situation.
Furniture deposit will be required.
Parking might be available upon discussion.
If interested, we also have virtual tour video available!
Thank you for looking!!

Description: Lord Dufferin Apartments offers stylish, renovated apartments in Liberty Village's west end. Packed with must-have on-site amenities and boasting a transit score of 100, these apartments will help you enhance your Toronto living experience. Offering pet friendly bachelor, 1 and 2 bedroom suites, you'll love the earthy tones and contemporary finishes outfitting these cozy apartments. The rental suites at Lord Dufferin Apartments feature dishwashers, balconies, and open-concept layouts, while our friendly on-site management and concierge staff address your maintenance needs and secure your peace of mind. Residents also enjoy a gym, laundry facilities, storage room with lockers, and party room all on-site; while just outside you'll find a cozy swimming pool and lounge area, plus a personal dog park for resident use. There's no shortage of amenities in Liberty Village, and Lord Dufferin Apartments puts you walking distance from some of its best. Take your workout outdoors with the paved path along Lake Ontario just steps from your door, or spend a day at the CNE, just as close by. With TTC bus and streetcar stops at your door, including 24-hour options on Queen Street, easy access to the Gardiner Expressway and QEW, and the Exhibition GO Station just minutes away, the entire city of Toronto is at your fingertips. Lord Dufferin Apartments is a Certified Rental Building and offers affordable rental living in the heart of one of Toronto's most vibrant neighbourhoods. Title: One Bedroom Haven in Little Italy! Utl incl. $2,450
Description:
Escape to the heart of Toronto's vibrant Little Italy and make this sun-soaked, ground-floor apartment your new home sanctuary. Nestled on a quaint street just steps from the legendary Trinity Bellwoods Park, this gorgeous space offers the perfect blend of tranquility and urban excitement.
✨ Apartment Highlights:
Private Entrance: Enjoy the convenience of a dedicated entrance, ensuring your privacy and ease of access. Sun-Soaked Interiors: Bask in natural light with soaring 10 ft ceilings that create an open and airy ambiance throughout the space. Spacious Kitchen & Living Area: The generously sized kitchen and living room provide ample space for both relaxation and entertaining. Separate Bedroom for Work/Life Balance: Create the ideal work-from-home setup in the separate bedroom, maintaining a perfect balance between your professional and personal life. Your Backyard Paradise: Step outside to discover your very own backyard patio and garden. If you have a green thumb, the garden is yours to tend to—we've nurtured an impressive veggie patch here for several years. It's the perfect spot to unwind, entertain friends, or simply enjoy a quiet moment surrounded by nature.
️ Prime Location:
Heart of Little Italy: Immerse yourself in the culture and energy of Little Italy, with the bustling businesses of College St just steps away. Trinity Bellwoods Park: Nature lovers rejoice! The legendary Trinity Bellwoods Park is at the end of your street, offering a picturesque escape for leisurely strolls and picnics.
☕ Convenience at Your Doorstep: Metro, Shoppers, and Tim Hortons: Your daily essentials are just a stone's throw away, making errands a breeze. Trendy Bars, Cafes & Restaurants: Experience the vibrant culinary scene on College St, home to the trendiest bars and restaurants. Your quiet home getaway is just steps from the heartbeat of Little Italy!
Parking: Street parking is available from the City of Toronto, ensuring easy accessibility to your new home. Please note that on-site parking is not available at this time.
Privacy & Laundry: The laundry closet is shared with the lower apartment, secured behind a private locked door for ultimate privacy.
How to Apply or Book a Viewing: Please reach out for more information or to schedule a viewing.
Don't miss the opportunity to make this stunning Little Italy apartment your own—your new home awaits! ✨

Title: Rose Park - 2 Bedroom Apartment for Rent
Description: These days it's all about downtown living. Spacious suites set on manicured grounds, the large bachelor, one bedroom and two bedroom rental suites feature balconies and large windows with phenomenal views of the city and lots of natural light. Nobody wants to waste time sitting in traffic and wasting precious hours every day. More and more, people are cutting out the commute and looking for a home that offers live, work and play potential – exactly what you'll find at Rose Park. Comprised of three highrise rental buildings, this community has great city access, just minutes from the Bloor Subway line.

Title: 600 Kingston Road - Kingston Estates Apartment for Rent
Description: Welcome to life in the Upper Beaches neighbourhood. Your rental community at Kingston Estates is conveniently surrounded by a wide selection of shopping, dining and recreational options. Your new home is steps away from The Big Carrot Beach Community Market, you can walk your dog in the wooded ravine trails of Glen Stewart Park, and there are schools, pre-schools and a community center within walking distance. The fun and sun of The Beaches and The Boardwalk along Lake Ontario are less than 10 minutes away by bicycle or car. The TTC stops just steps from your door – so all of Toronto is easily accessible and the nearby Danforth GO station makes commuting a breeze.Your modern and spacious rental apartment features an upgraded kitchen with granite countertops, new appliances, and ceramic floors. Laundry facilities are conveniently located on-site and storage lockers will help you cut down on clutter. Experience the peace of mind of monitored security cameras and a friendly on-site management team – there to deal with any maintenance issues in the building or in your suite. Never hunt for a parking spot – there is dedicated visitor parking for your guests and assigned parking available for you. Kingston Estates is a Certified Rental Building.Your new life is waiting for you at Kingston Estates (600 Kingston Road). Don't keep it waiting for too long! nullBuilding OverivewWelcome to life in the Upper Beaches neighbourhood. Description: This well maintained property lies behind a row of trees, adjacent to two schools and opposite a small plaza that has its own IGA store. Just down the street are the extensive shops of Cedarbrae Mall and the Cedar Heights Plaza. Close by are Densgrove Park and the Curran Hill Ravine. The Scarborough Golf and Country Club is just a few blocks south. This area is populated by several churches, two hospitals, and a main library. The neighborhood includes Cedarbrae, Cedarbrook and Cedar Ridge community centers, all which are a short distance from the building. This Scarborough rental building features a smart card laundry system and a lobby on a private drive that faces away from the main road. All suites have wood floors and some have ensuite storage. Many units also have two bathrooms, a balcony and an exceptional view. These Toronto apartments have public elevators. There is both outside and inside parking on the property. There are guest and extra parking spaces available. All spaces are assigned. The grounds feature landscaping and flower gardens. Onsite services include the rental management office and a main laundry facility. There is public transit within a block of the building. An expressway is less than four blocks away. A health care facility is just down the street. The building is also close to a golf course, a park, public schools, and a shopping strip. All heat, water and electricity is included in the rental price. All Pets Allowed.FEATURES SUMMARY

Title: 1 BR in Beaches - Large corner unit
Address: 1836 Queen St E, Toronto, ON M4L 1G9

Large and spacious corner unit 1 bedroom apartment in Beaches area. One block form beach boardwalk and parks, minutes to financial district and highways. Lots of natural light. Not a basement unit.

Title: Room in apartment
Description:
Looking for someone to take over my lease.
Small bedroom + study/storage room for $600 a month in Scarborough (1275 Markham rd).
Only looking for women.
There are currently two other girls living here, I’ve had no issues they’re both very sweet and quiet. Often feels like I have the apartment to myself.
Apartment is always very clean.
You have full access to living area with TV, kitchen, and bathroom.
Reason for moving is I am relocating for a job.
Disclaimer: I won’t lie, room is very small, I’d say it’s perfect for students.
5 minute walk away from Centennial Progress campus, 10 min drive away from Morningside. Very close to the University as well.
Lots of stores and fast food near by.
You keep all the furniture showed in the photos (dresser, bed frame and mattress, shelf in corner, lamp *not salt lamp*). I have an additional mattress topper on the mattress that I bought which I will be taking with me.
You can even keep the leaves decoration I have hanging on the wall and the little shelf I put beside the bed if you’d like.

Everything you can imagine is all around you and easily accessible on foot – malls, schools, movie theatres, live theatre venues, even Yonge and Dundas Square. If it's not close by, you probably don't need it!Your renovated, stylish rental apartment features a designer-inspired kitchen with quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. You will love the luxurious convenience of in-suite laundry. Our friendly, on-site professional management team will make sure you never have to worry about any maintenance issues in your suite or in the building. Finding parking is a breeze thanks to our above-ground parking area. You'll feel safe and sound thanks to our monitored security cameras and upgraded intercom system. Of course, your pets are more than welcome here, too!Why settle for less when you don't have to? 85 Wellesley Street provides the ultimate setting for your story.

Description: Welcome to Raglan Gardens, a luxury high rise apartment with suites available in the family friendly St. Clair West neighbourhood of Toronto.Our modernized bachelor, one, and two bedroom suites offer sleek comfortable spaces with attractive vinyl plank flooring throughout. All suites indulge both comfort and convenience with new stainless steel appliances including dishwashers and microwaves, beautiful bathrooms, and balconies offering residents a private outdoor space. Additionally, this impressive apartment building includes modern laundry facilities, new security & fob system,  and engaging community events.Steps from Bathurst Street, residents of Raglan Gardens are conveniently close to shopping, grocers, pharmacies, and an array of popular restaurants. Nature enthusiasts will love living close to several parks including Wells Hill Park and playground, and two ravines with trails and greenspace to explore. This Cedarvale location also offers residents a quick commute with bus, streetcar, and subway stops minutes away. *If it’s still up - it’s still available* Thanks!
Lease Assignment Available APRIL 1st!
Hey everyone! I'm heading back to France and am looking for someone to take over the lease of my charming apartment in the heart of Toronto's Village in Downtown Toronto ️‍️‍⚧️
Location: 36 Maitland Street, Toronto - this apartment is in a prime spot known for its lively nightlife and fabulous drag queen shows. You'll be just a 7-minute walk from the supermarket, close to yorkville and to several convenience stores.
About the Apartment:
- Spacious 865 sq ft (approx. 80 sq meters)
- 1 bedroom + a large den that can be separated by the tenant.
- Roommates up to 3 people
- Large bathroom flooded with natural light
- Walk-in closet + closet in the entrance (plenty of storage!
- On-site laundry facilities
- Pet friendly
This beautiful apartment oozes old-world charm and character, making it a truly unique place to live. The lease runs until November 30th, with an easy option to extend, giving you plenty of flexibility.
It's perfect for anyone who loves being in the heart of the city and enjoys the unique cultural experiences the Village has to offer.
If you or someone you know is interested in taking over the lease, please DM me for more details.

Title: 2 unfurnished bedrooms in a sweet 1400 sqft 12 ft ceilings apart
Description:
Hey folks,
I have a two room up for grabs in a pretty sweet 3-bed unit at the Selby, starting June 1, 2024, for a 12-month lease. This place is a spacious 1400 sqft with massive 12-foot ceilings!
The kitchen's got all the bells and whistles, plus an island, plates, and cooking utensils ready to be shared. Our living room is all decked out with comfy furniture, plants, and cool art that really make it feel like home. And for movie nights, we've got a 65-inch TV with a killer surround sound system.
Location? We're at 25 Selby Street in Bloor-Sherbourne. You can practically roll out of bed and into the subway station, grocery stores, pharmacies, and restaurants. We're just a quick stroll from Bloor and Yonge, Rosedale, Yorkville, Evergreen Brick Works, and Riverdale Park (for all you nature buffs). If you're at UofT or TU, it's a breezy walk.
The Selby's got all the cool stuff: gym, pool deck, spa (steam, sauna, meditation room), BBQ area, movie theatre, dining rooms, game rooms - you name it. Plus, there's always something going on, from building events to free weekly fitness classes (HIIT, Yoga), and even Salsa classes.
Master Bedroom - 1750 CAD/month This room is huge with an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet. It's pretty much like having your own little apartment.
Second Bedroom - 1350 CAD/month
Ideal Roomie: Looking for someone who's chill, respectful of shared spaces, and easy to get along with. If this sounds like your kind of place, Dm me :)

Title: 600 Kingston Road - Kingston Estates Apartment for Rent
Description: Welcome to life in the Upper Beaches neighbourhood. Your rental community at Kingston Estates is conveniently surrounded by a wide selection of shopping, dining and recreational options. Your new home is steps away from The Big Carrot Beach Community Market, you can walk your dog in the wooded ravine trails of Glen Stewart Park, and there are schools, pre-schools and a community center within walking distance. The fun and sun of The Beaches and The Boardwalk along Lake Ontario are less than 10 minutes away by bicycle or car. Sherrol (she/her)(bipoc) - Early 30s mixed race ethnicity. Host events within the lgbtq+ community and works Monday to Thursday early mornings. I'm very active and always doing something creative. Love my low-key nights of reading or watching a movie but also love being social and going out!

Title: 600 Kingston Road - Kingston Estates Apartment for Rent
Description: Welcome to life in the Upper Beaches neighbourhood. Your rental community at Kingston Estates is conveniently surrounded by a wide selection of shopping, dining and recreational options. Your new home is steps away from The Big Carrot Beach Community Market, you can walk your dog in the wooded ravine trails of Glen Stewart Park, and there are schools, pre-schools and a community center within walking distance. The fun and sun of The Beaches and The Boardwalk along Lake Ontario are less than 10 minutes away by bicycle or car. The TTC stops just steps from your door – so all of Toronto is easily accessible and the nearby Danforth GO station makes commuting a breeze.Your modern and spacious rental apartment features an upgraded kitchen with granite countertops, new appliances, and ceramic floors. Laundry facilities are conveniently located on-site and storage lockers will help you cut down on clutter. Experience the peace of mind of monitored security cameras and a friendly on-site management team – there to deal with any maintenance issues in the building or in your suite. Never hunt for a parking spot – there is dedicated visitor parking for your guests and assigned parking available for you. Title: Downtown | Harbourfront | Room for rent short or long term

Description:
About
This beautiful 2 bed, 2 bathroom is located right at the Harbourfront. The postal code of Waterclub condos, Toronto, is M5J 2Y2.
You will share the apartment with a female working professional in her late twenties.
You will have you own room with your own private washroom including walk-in shower. Your room is equipped with a twin bed, study desk, and standing lamps. Clothes can be stored in a walk-in closet. Also, you will have access to a fully furnished living room with couch, TV and an office area, and the kitchen is fully equipped. The apartment has an washer and dryer and is located on the tenth floor. You will have access to the gym and pool with sauna in the building. The building also has a barbeque area. And your safety is the first priority at this place, as there is a doorman and concierge 24/7. Wi-fi, water and electricity are included in the monthly payment.
Move-in time can be between April 1st and May 1st . The commitment is a year-long lease with monthly payments. The rent is $1625 with utilities of about $75.
A short- term rent of one or more months is also possible.

Title: 2 BEDROOM APARTMENT | APRIL
Description:
2 BEDROOM APARTMENT | APRIL
*If it’s still up - it’s still available* Thanks!
Lease Assignment Available APRIL 1st!
Hey everyone! I'm heading back to France and am looking for someone to take over the lease of my charming apartment in the heart of Toronto's Village in Downtown Toronto ️‍️‍⚧️
Location: few steps from WELLESLEY STATION.
36 Maitland Street, Toronto - this apartment is in a prime spot known for its lively nightlife and fabulous drag queen shows. You'll be just a 7-minute walk from the supermarket, close to yorkville and to several convenience stores.
About the Apartment:
- Spacious 865 sq ft (approx. 80 sq meters)
- 1 bedroom + a large den (can be count as second bedroom)
- Large bathroom flooded with natural light
- Walk-in closet + closet in the entrance (plenty of storage!
- On-site laundry facilities
- Pet friendly
This beautiful apartment oozes old-world charm and character, making it a truly unique place to live. The lease runs until November 30th, with an easy option to extend, giving you plenty of flexibility.
It's perfect for anyone who loves being in the heart of the city and enjoys the unique cultural experiences the Village has to offer.
If you or someone you know is interested in taking over the lease, please DM me for more details.

Title: Shared apartment in 2 bedroom apartment
Address: 260 Wellesley St E, Toronto, ON M4X 1G6
Description: Looking for a single male or female who is tired of commuting into Toronto M-F. But goes home on weekends ,mostly. Or a single who is basically commuting to take care of their dog,I'm fine with someone bringing their dog,I have a husky. I have a furnished bedroom,shared bathroom,with well equipped kitchen,WiFi, tv, designed balcony with loveseat,plants,seperate fridge. I'm a physically fit, masculine gay guy with a Husky who's always out on trails,parks with the husky. We're usually out in mornings,then out around 3-7, home for some dinner and chill out till 9,so most of the time in the apartment 6-9,then out again till 11. I'm laidback,into football ⚽,films,cooking,music,culture,conversation and humour,420,some,I like upbeat,fun people. I'm into life and outdoors and exercising . I still have some cigarettes but only by the balcony door,and always outside when it's not freezing,if you smoke I'd expect the same. And don't have smoke lingering inside,I'm currently on meds to help quit smoking. The 2 subway lines are both either 5 min walk to Sherborne station or quick bus to Castle Frank or Wellesley station. Cabbagetown begins across the street,the best preserved Victorian neighborhood in N America. Endless bike and hiking trails,and Evergreen Brickworks, Riverdale park and zoo,endless food choices, restaurants,pubs and the Phoenix,Danforth music hall,Greektown all walking distance. Well populated area,safe too,no tents,open drug use,etc, it has the best views,nature,parks and Cabbagetown,and downtown easy to get to. If you need a parking space I've had 1 before and can get it for $100/month,I would have to have your ID etc to have it on the lease agreement at my building. There's also parking at the building metered,with overnight fees as well. Please email me at jakephtoronto@gmail.com to discuss,I'd consider other people than M-F commuters,I just want someone who's busy and out alot,but it's priced now for a low maintenance male or female,M-F home on weekends,email me with your situation and a photo of yourself and we can talk.I only accept cash payments,first and last month can be e-transfer,if needed,but other payment in cash,no etransfers,credit card,cheques,thank you.(in floor heating,water hydro,wifi included. No freelancers whatsoever,because that's what I basically am. The furniture can be changed to the right persons liking. Also if your a single person who is basically going home to take care of your dog,then let me know,I'm ok with you bringing your dog with you during the week,thanks

Description:

Title: Furnished 2 bedroom lower level apartment
Description:
Available for mid and long term rentals- minimum 28 days, available after 0ct 31/24. This open concept apartment is your professionally decorated and fully furnished "home away from home." The suite comes complete with a washer/dryer, dishwasher, microwave, fully appointed kitchen, bedding, linens, towels, fully enclosed backyard, BBQ, free utilities, free Wifi, premium cable TV, air conditioning, free access to adult and children's bicycles, and free parking. Biweekly cleaning services are also included.
This beautiful 2 bedroom lower level suite is 1100 SqF(905SqM) can accommodate 4 people. The suite is an open concept living/dining/kitchen space.
*Full 8'-0" ceilings.
*The galley type eat in kitchen (13ft x 8 ft) has a breakfast bar with stools, new granite countertops, computer station, dishwasher, microwave, refrigerator and range
*Sole access to adjacent laundry room with a gas dryer, washer and laundry tub.
*Dining area is 17ft x 10ft with a 4 ft x 5 ft south facing window and garden door. Dining table seats 6.
*The living area (11ft x 11ft) has a 42" flat screen TV, a cozy fireplace area with a three seat sectional seat sofa and a 4ft x 2ft window.
*The bathroom (5 ft x 7 ft) is a 4 pc with a bathtub/shower and new white subway tiles and cork flooring.
*The bedroom is 14'x12' and has a queen size bed and 6ft closet. There is another 6ft closet at the front hallway.
*Walkout to a 10ft x 12 ft private latticed patio with a gas BBQ, teak table and 4 chairs.
*Sound blanket insulation between bedrooms and soundproofing between suites.
*Bedroom #1 (100 SqF) has a queen bed and a 5 ft closet
*Bedroom #2 (100Sqf) has two twin beds and a 5 ft closet. Can be removed for crib or extra space.
The suite also comes with a shared backyard and garden, storage shed and one parking space per unit (additional street parking is available.)
Location
This two-story apartment is located on a quiet tree-lined street in the heart of three well-established West Toronto neighbourhoods: Roncesvalles, High Park, and Bloor West Village. This area is well known for its great food scene and family friendly communities. Recently, our neighbourhood High Park/Swansea has been ranked in the Top 3, out of 140, in Toronto Life Magazine's "The Best Places to live in the City."
The apartment is within walking distance of excellent primary and secondary schools, local gyms, yoga studios, bistros, cafes, restaurants, pubs, bakeries, fruit stores, specialty cheese stores, butcher shops and the recently saved and community run Revue Cinema.
Old growth trees and many parks surround Alhambra Ave. Notably, the house is two blocks from High Park, Toronto's largest park and hub for outdoor activities, including numerous playgrounds, ponds, running/hiking/walking trails, a children's zoo, skating rink, swimming pool, children's wading pools, lease free dog areas, baseball/soccer/football fields, restaurants, and the Howard Park Tennis Club. Just a short walk south from High Park leads you to the Lakeshore where you can traverse the waterfront Martin Goodman running and biking trail, Sunnyside Beach and its volleyball courts, restaurant, and swimming pool. Other nearby parks include High Park, Columbus Parkette, Erwin Krichhahn Park and Lithuania Park.
Transportation
Subway and Streetcars: Our Neighbourhood scores 100 out of 100 on the Transit score website for cities. Just steps to the Keele or Dundas West Subway stations and to 4 different streetcars lines that run through the city. (505 Dundas line, 306 Carlton/College line, and 504 King St Line, Queen Line)
Walking: Based on the "WALK SCORE WEBSITE" our property on Alhambra Ave, has a Walk Score of 98 out of 100. This location is a Walker's Paradise so daily errands do not require a car.
Driving: Alhambra Ave is a five minute drive from the Gardiner Expressway/QEW, a highway running across the downtown core of Toronto.
Neighbourhood Details
Grocery Stores: The closest grocery stores are all walk-able: Loblaws, Green Field Fruit and Vegetable Store and FRESHCO. Many local bakeries, butcher stores, Green grocers and other food stores are nearby.
Bistros and Coffee Shops: Nearby shops: Barque Smoke House, La Cubano, Starbucks, Outpost Coffee Roasters Ltd.
Schools: Nearby schools include, Keele School, Howard Park, Fern, Garden Ave Public School, Humberside, and numerous Montessori and day care locations.
Universities: Alhambra Ave is near the University of Toronto, Ryerson University, George Brown College and York University.
Hospitals: St. Joseph's Hospital, Sick Kids Hospital, Mount Sinai, St. Michaels, and General Hospital.

Title: DOWNTOWN TORONTO ALL INCLUSIVE STUDENT SUMMER SUBLET
Description:
HI! I'm a first year OCAD student and I'm leaving for the summer. I'm looking for a female student to sublet my apartment at Parkside Student Residence. Available from April 19 – August 19, 2023. Can be available a week or so earlier.
The unit is a 2-bedroom, 1 bath - with a common living room and bathroom, and two private bedrooms with desk. The other room will be occupied by my friend, a very kind female student first year at TMU. The unit is fully furnished with a single bed, desk, and office chair in the bedroom and a couch with small tables and smart TV in the common area.
Rent includes all utilities, Wi-Fi, 24-hour security and maintenance. Amenities include access to 24-hour gym, theatre room, games rooms, study rooms, outdoor terrace, etc(see last picture for more). Mail service and card-operated laundry facilities are located within the building.
Are you tired of making meals every night when you're tired from a long day at school? Well, There is an additional mandatory meal plan for the cafeteria located in the building, which includes 3 quality meals per day at an unlimited buffet. The cost is $1490 per month for rent, plus the unlimited monthly meal plan $910 ($2400 total). Price can be lightly negotiated. It gives parents great peace of mind, to have their student in a safe building with all meals included.
Parkside Student Residence is located across from the historic Maple Leaf Gardens and is within walking distance of many schools including the University of Toronto, Toronto Metropolitan University, George Brown College, and OCADu. The TTC streetcar stops right out front and the closest subway stop is College Station. Parkside is also within walking distance to shopping at IKEA and Eaton Centre. There is a convenient Tim Hortons located within the building and a Loblaws grocery right across the street as well as numerous stores and restaurants.
For more information or pictures please don't hesitate to contact me. I'm happy to do a video call or walkthrough of the place. :) You can also visit the Parkside website at www.live-parkside.ca.

Title: Private Room near St. Lawrence Market
Description:
Unit: 1 large bedroom spanning 10’2 x 12’8 with a sliding mirror closet(perfect for working from home) in a nearly 1300 sqft apartment, primary access to bathroom, in-unit laundry, A/C, in a two bed two bath home in St. Lawrence area. Fully furnished shared areas including breville espresso machine, instant pot, toaster, microwave, full size stove and oven plus all bowls, glasses, plates and cutlery.
Located right downtown in an extremely quiet unit with no downtown noise. Just steps away from the water, transit, shops, grocery and restaurants.
Lease terms: This is a roommate search starting from March 1st 2024 (flexible) for one year (or shorter). Room can be fully furnished with a bed, side tables and dresser if needed at no cost. First and last month required on approval.
Price: $1500 per month including internet and heat.
Location: Front & church. 1 minute walk to Metro, St. Lawrence Market, LCBO, Cafes, Bars, Rexall and more. Close to Freshco and Loblaws for other grocery options. 2 minute walk to king Street street car
Required documents for application: • proof of income • landlord reference • last month's rent deposit* credit report
More detail:
Located in the heart of downtown, this apartment is the 7th floor of a low rise and is a two bedroom, two bathroom unit with amazing views of the city.
The nearly 1300 sqft 2 bed 2 bath bright apartment features in-unit laundry and dryer, a dishwasher, A/C, large rooftop patio with bbq grills and a gym in the building along with guest parking. The apartment has a vibrant atrium that is absolutely gorgeous. You live right downtown with a 100 walk score with a more residential feel. The unit is very quiet! The ideal candidate would be someone who is clean, social but also fine to do their own thing, responsible, and mature. It is an 2SLGBTQ+ friendly home.
We cannot accept more pets due to condo rules. If this unit is something you are interested we would be happy to arrange a viewing and please let us know some background info on yourself. Thanks and look forward to meeting you!

The monthly payment is $1900.00 for long term. Rent covers cable, hydro and water. This is a furnished condo, if you have furniture, it would not suit you. Extra large bedroom with complete bedroom set. Lovely view from large balcony. Full bed set with dresser and side tables. Folding bed with mattresses for guests, is available.
This neighborhood is diversified, safe and family friendly. No sub-letting or sharing with non-family members is allowed.
The cable which is included on the rent of $1900 includes Bell Better Package, Crave and Starz-Movie Series pack and Time Shifting (selling at $140.00). Tenant is responsible for own internet, but I can facilitate reliable Bell Fibe High Speed (Gagabit Fibe 1.5 150 MBPS) at 60% discount.
Similar condos are rented for MUCH MORE over $2000.00. The reason it is offered at a reduced amount is that I prefer long term (minimum 6 months).
First and Last plus $1000 Breakage Deposit to be returned if no damage has occurred.

Title: 833 Kennedy Road - Helen Towers Apartment for Rent
Description: Situated in a family-oriented area of Scarborough, Helen Towers is a wonderful rental community located close to several schools, a childcare centre, a community centre, public library, and shopping. Your home backs onto Treverton Park – the perfect place to walk your dog or take the kids to the playground. There is a grocery store and a Shoppers Drug Mart just steps away on Eglinton Avenue East. The TTC stops outside your door and The Kennedy subway station, the Kennedy GO station, and Scarborough RT are a short walk away – making all parts of Toronto and the GTA easily accessible.All the shopping and entertainment options of Eglinton Town Centre and Eglinton Square are minutes away as well. Centennial College Ashtonbee Campus, Ashtonbee Reservoir Park, Wexford Park and nature trails are all close by.Your bright and spacious, pet-friendly rental apartment features gleaming parquet floors and a private balcony. Enjoy the convenience of on-site laundry facilities, plenty of visitor parking, and parking available for you. Experience the peace of mind that comes with monitored security cameras and a friendly on-site management team – there to handle any maintenance issues that may arise. Helen Towers is a Certified Rental Building.If you're looking for a comfortable, convenient, and family-friendly place to call home, you can stop searching. Title: Newly built 2 Bed 1 Bath basement apt w/ high ceiling

Newly-built, bright, modern, and spacious basement apartment with high ceilings.

- 2 large bedrooms

Public Transit
- To TTC Leslie Stn: 3 mins walk to Leslie St bus stop, 6 min bus ride to TTC Leslie subway station (line 4)

- To Cummer GO Stn: 3 mins drive to Leslie/Cummer
-To Oriole GO Stn: 5 mins drive to Leslie/401
Nearby places

- Peanut Plaza (4 mins drive) Supermarket, McDonalds, Dollarama, and many more

Colleges

Schools

Description:
DT Bremner/York St waterfront financial core (all-incl + amenities)
Available immediately! Experience prime waterfront living in the downtown core for a steal – Approx. 970 sqf, Sun-soaked open concept living/dining room with ceiling to floor glass windows and South-west partial lake view gives tons of natural light across the unit all day (with window shades for added privacy). Unit features a chef-sized Kitchen W/Granite breakfast bar & breakfast Area/Home Office, 2 large-sized bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, 1 extra-large corner terrace balcony and 1 regular balcony. (PLS SEE ALL PICS).
INCLUSIONS - S/Steel Appliances: Fridge, Stove with Hood, Dishwasher, Microwave, New LG Washer And Dryer, All Elfs And Window Coverings, 1 underground parking close to elevator, secure bike rack room, and separate storage locker area. Rent is $3500 (all-inclusive) Bell 1.5Gbps unlimited internet access and all utilities (heat, hydro and water) (total $400+ in value). Also see amenities listed BELOW. Can discuss PETS if any.
This perfect central location covers Union Station, Scotia Bank Arena, Harbourfront and Parks, CN Tower + Rogers Centre all within a 5-minute WALKING radius! The York-st. Gardiner exit is just a 2-min drive away AND the building is also perfectly connected to the underground PATH adjoining a LONGOS which covers all of your grocery needs. The adjoining buildings also feature Starkbucks, Tim Hortons, a Dollarama and a Winners location not to mention a plethora of restaurants and parks in the area.
Building is LOADED with AMENITIES – 24/7 Concierge, Guest suites, BBQ and picnic garden area, library and study rooms, expansive party room (20+), movie theater room (sitting 15+), swimming pool and jacuzzi, sauna, basketball court, and games rooms including ping pong and multiple billiards tables. Title: 200 Dufferin Street - Lord Dufferin Apartments Apartment for Ren
Description: Lord Dufferin Apartments offers stylish, renovated apartments in Liberty Village's west end. Packed with must-have on-site amenities and boasting a transit score of 100, these apartments will help you enhance your Toronto living experience. Offering pet friendly bachelor, 1 and 2 bedroom suites, you'll love the earthy tones and contemporary finishes outfitting these cozy apartments. The rental suites at Lord Dufferin Apartments feature dishwashers, balconies, and open-concept layouts, while our friendly on-site management and concierge staff address your maintenance needs and secure your peace of mind. Residents also enjoy a gym, laundry facilities, storage room with lockers, and party room all on-site; while just outside you'll find a cozy swimming pool and lounge area, plus a personal dog park for resident use. There's no shortage of amenities in Liberty Village, and Lord Dufferin Apartments puts you walking distance from some of its best. Take your workout outdoors with the paved path along Lake Ontario just steps from your door, or spend a day at the CNE, just as close by. With TTC bus and streetcar stops at your door, including 24-hour options on Queen Street, easy access to the Gardiner Expressway and QEW, and the Exhibition GO Station just minutes away, the entire city of Toronto is at your fingertips. Lord Dufferin Apartments is a Certified Rental Building and offers affordable rental living in the heart of one of Toronto's most vibrant neighbourhoods. Enjoy the serenity of a quiet residential street in the desirable Willowdale neighbourhood. Immerse yourself in a peaceful environment while still being close to urban conveniences.
2) Fully Renovated Lower Unit with Large Windows:
Step into a newly renovated haven featuring modern aesthetics and ample natural light. The lower unit boasts large windows that create a bright and inviting atmosphere, making every day a delight.
3) Open Concept Kitchen with Brand New Stainless Steel Appliances:
Embrace the joy of cooking in an open-concept kitchen equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances. The perfect space for culinary enthusiasts and those who appreciate a modern, functional kitchen.

Enjoy the convenience of a shared coin laundry facility right on the lower level. No need to venture far to take care of your laundry needs, providing practicality and ease.
5) Walking Distance to TTC, York Region Transit, and Finch GO Station:
Commuters' delight! Explore the city effortlessly with the convenience of walking distance to TTC, York Region Transit, and Finch GO Station, ensuring seamless connectivity for your daily travels.
Availability:
Ready for occupancy starting February 20th, 2024

Title: Terrain BORD DE L'EAU cul de sac à Sainte-Julienne Lanaudière
Description: BORD DE L'EAU. Voici l’occasion unique d'acquérir une perle rare à seulement 1h de Montréal! Magnifique terrain de 46 642 pi.ca. au Domaine du Lac Grégoire et du Lac Rond en face du lac Grégoire. Il se situe à la fin du domaine qui donne sur un cul de sac. Le chemin est déneigé l’hiver par la municipalité. Il n'y a aucun voisin derrière, ni devant, ni à gauche, ni à droite. La paix et la tranquillité des lieux boisés de feuillus et de conifères sont à l'honneur. Le terrain est divisé en deux sections séparé par le chemin. Vendu ensemble seulement. Une de 7 250 pi.ca. qui donne un accès privé au lac ou passe un ravissant ruisseau à la musique apaisante. Celui-ci se déverse dans le Lac Grégoire qui est un lac de tête. Pêche possible et embarcation sans moteur. La bordure du lac est de 38 pied. L'autre partie est de 39 392 pi.ca. Déjà déboisé pour construction, entré de gravier d'environ 50 pied. Permis déjà émis prêt pour construction immédiate. Plan certifié inclus par SCAD Architecture. Champs d'épuration pour 3 chambres à coucher complété. Au fond du terrain s'y trouve un ravissant atelier chaleureux 12X12 sur 2 étages parfaitement isolé et chauffé. Laissez place à votre imagination!

Title: 1 Bedroom 1 Bath Apartment in Toronto (High Park North)
Description:
This is an attractive and friendly second floor 1 bedroom, 1 living room, and 4 pc washroom apartment in North High Park.
It has a well-equipped kitchen featuring eat-in area, brand-new stainless steel appliances, lots of cabinetry and shelving, large pantry, walk-out to private balcony overlooking the backyard.
The unit comes unfurnished, has central air cooling and heating and shared on-site laundry facilities.
The lower level foyer can serve as a mudroom or shoe/coat storage while the upper level has a large linen closed.
Utilities (hydro, gas, heat, water, laundry) are all included in rent.
There's a large shared sunroom at the front and patio and shed for additional storage (bicycles, etc) in the backyard.
Affordable street parking permit is available.
It's a great location: short walk to Bloor St, Dundas St., trendy Roncesvalles Ave (groceries, other stores, cafes, restaurants, places of worship) and to High Park.
It's very well connected to city transit: 3 min walk to subway (both Keele and Dundas West) stations, 8 min walk to GO and UP Express station and 8 min UP train ride to Union Station in downtown Toronto and 15 min ride to Pearson Airport. Also, it's a close distance to Gardiner Expressway.

Title: 3 month only Sublet Toronto Bloor & Spadina Area
Description:
Sublet, whole furnished 1 bedroom apartment in downtown Toronto for $3,300/month for 3 months. With a view of the city and easy access to everything in the annex area. What is included is heat water hydro/electricity. What you May pay for/set up is internet (it is wired and ready to go, but you will be solely responsible for that). There is no dishwasher. There is coin laundry in the building. There is an elevator. No parking. It is a 6 minute walk to the Bloor spadina subway and metro gerocery store. There are so many great places to eat, librarys, museums, arts, theatre - shopping and entertainment in the area. You are very close to yorkville too.
The location is fantastic! The apartment is fairly spacious for 1 bathroom including tub, 1 bedroom with a very comfortable queen size bed, two side tables and closet. The kitchen is half open concept with two stools for the island, a dining table off to the side, and living room. There is also a balcony, with a table and 2 chairs. There is a tv, but again, no cable and that would be part of the internet if you choose to hook it up and pay for a plan that works for you.
All in all, it is a great place to live in the city. Though do note it is an older building, so it does have that charm. They do keep it up with taking care of it. And you will be going through the building manager with her required paperwork and such to check that everything is in order for accountability & ID to know who is in the unit incase of an emergency. Though all payments will be going through myself and my mother, on which who’s behalf I am posting this add for the 1 time only - temporary 3 month sublet.
A $500 certified check is required for damages which will be returned to you upon seeing everything is as it was left. Along with the 1sts month payment immediately ($3,300) to hold it and the remainder ($6,600)the day before you will be moving in. Which we will have to arrange to get the elevator if you require it to be held for you.
The place is furnished so once we are further along in the process I can give you a more detailed list of items you will have access to. For example there is a microwave and basic kitchen ware. Serious inquiries only. No refunds. So the total amount is a certified cheque to be returned to you upon no damages/things left as they were found for $500, plus 3 months furnished rent ($3,300 x 3 = $9, 900).
March 15 is a possible start date - June 15 2024. No smoking, pets or children. Ideal for 1 person or a couple. I will be happy to answer questions for serious inquiries only. Thank you.

Title: $2600 Little Italy GEM! 1 Bed 1 Bath Utilities included
Description:
Escape to the heart of Toronto's vibrant Little Italy and make this sun-soaked, ground-floor apartment your new home sanctuary. Nestled on a quaint street just steps from the legendary Trinity Bellwoods Park, this gorgeous space offers the perfect blend of tranquility and urban excitement.
✨ Apartment Highlights:
Private Entrance: Enjoy the convenience of a dedicated entrance, ensuring your privacy and ease of access. Sun-Soaked Interiors: Bask in natural light with soaring 10 ft ceilings that create an open and airy ambiance throughout the space. Spacious Kitchen & Living Area: The generously sized kitchen and living room provide ample space for both relaxation and entertaining. Separate Bedroom for Work/Life Balance: Create the ideal work-from-home setup in the separate bedroom, maintaining a perfect balance between your professional and personal life. Your Backyard Paradise: Step outside to discover your very own backyard patio and garden. If you have a green thumb, the garden is yours to tend to—we've nurtured an impressive veggie patch here for several years. It's the perfect spot to unwind, entertain friends, or simply enjoy a quiet moment surrounded by nature.
️ Prime Location:
Heart of Little Italy: Immerse yourself in the culture and energy of Little Italy, with the bustling businesses of College St just steps away. Trinity Bellwoods Park: Nature lovers rejoice! The legendary Trinity Bellwoods Park is at the end of your street, offering a picturesque escape for leisurely strolls and picnics.
☕ Convenience at Your Doorstep: Metro, Shoppers, and Tim Hortons: Your daily essentials are just a stone's throw away, making errands a breeze. Trendy Bars, Cafes & Restaurants: Experience the vibrant culinary scene on College St, home to the trendiest bars and restaurants. Your quiet home getaway is just steps from the heartbeat of Little Italy!
Parking: Street parking is available from the City of Toronto, ensuring easy accessibility to your new home. Please note that on-site parking is not available at this time.
Privacy & Laundry: The laundry closet is shared with the lower apartment, secured behind a private locked door for ultimate privacy.
How to Apply or Book a Viewing: To start your journey in this enchanting space, whether in person or virtually, please reach out for more information or to schedule a viewing.
Don't miss the opportunity to make this stunning Little Italy apartment your own—your new home awaits! ✨
*ask about rent discount for 2024!*

Title: Campus One Sublet - Premium flat with Kitchen
Amenities: Gym, Concierge, 24 Hour Security, Bicycle Parking, Storage Space, Elevator in Building
Description:
BEST STUDENT APARTMENT! Premium private room at Campus One, with TWO shared bathrooms and KITCHEN. Sublet from May 1st until August 20th, perfect for summer students! FULLY FURNISHED suite along with a building full of amenities and 24-hour security making it SUPER SAFE.
A suite with three other lovely girls, with a couch, table and chairs, air fryer, oven, microwave, toaster etc. TWO bathrooms (with showers). Private lockable bedroom with double bed, desk, chest of drawers, wardrobe, and lots of storage. The suite also comes with a KITCHEN, meaning there is NO MEAL PLAN EXPENSE (very rare in Toronto student accommodation).
Campus One is located in the heart of downtown Toronto, with streetcar and subway services readily available, and the University of Toronto campus is less than a five-minute walk away! The building is very new and has a wide range of amenities including a 24-hour gym and study lounge as well as a dining hall and more. All BILLS INCLUDED (water, heating, high-speed Wi-Fi).
additional: Keyless entry, Waterfront views, City views, Study Rooms, Community Kitchen, Fireplace Lounge, Movie Theatres, Yoga/Dance Studio, Video Game Lounge, Fitness-on-Demand Studio, Arts & Crafts Studio, Arcade Room, Innovation Lounge, Ping Pong Lounges, Restaurants, Convenience Stores, Downtown attractions, and Dining Hall.

Title: 1 bed, 1 bath basement apartment in the heart of Riverdale
Description:
Renovated open concept 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom basement apartment with private enterance for rent right next to Broadview and Gerrard. Located on Hamilton St in the heart of beautiful Riverdale which is a quickly developing central Toronto neighbourhood. Ample transit options converge at Broadview and Gerrard taking you to any part of the city you desire. Catch the 504 to King, the 505 to Dundas, the 506 to College or a number of vehicles heading in the opposite direction on a short ride up to Broadview Station so you can ride the Blood subway line. Street parking often available with permit.
You’ll be close to bustling Queen st East which is filled with a variety of restaurants and shops to explore. We’re just a short south eastern walk away from stylish Leslieville and a short north western walk away from beautiful Cabbagetown. Both are well regarded downtown Toronto neighbourhoods filled with culture to investigate and shop in. You’ll be right next to Little Chinatown which is quickly developing with good places to eat and a funky bar option for a pint.
The Danforth is a pleasant walk northward walk along Riverdale Park’s exceptional valley view. Riverdale Park is one of the most amazing parks in the city offering various spots to sit and play or exercise as well as the best view of the sunset you can find downtown viewed from the eastern hill. Pull up a blanket or find a bench around dusk to take in the city skyline illuminated by all the colours of the setting sun. Around the eastern hills there are great spots to setup for a summer park session and soak up the warmth surrounded by lots of green. Riverdale Farm is a great place to visit in the western potion of Riverdale Park. Spend some pleasant time with the animals or take kids out for an afternoon there.
Move in April 1st or get first months rent prorated if moving in partway through March.
First and last month rent to be paid before move in date.
Background check by SungleKey required.

Title: 1 Large room in 2 br apartment
Description:
Rental post 800sq/ft corner apartment
OFFERING SHORT/LONG TERM RENTAL
Type: 1 big room in a 2 bedroom apartment
Level: 2nd floor above a store
Date available: March1st
Term: 6mos/1year
Rent: $1500 + internet($25) + utilities ($60 right now) this is split in two
Location: Gerrard and Broadview
Streetcar on doorstep 505 & 506. 20min walk to Broadview station or 8min streetcar/bus. The apartment is located in the intersection so very accessible to all directions. The apartment building is also beside an Asian fruit market/grocery store called Galaxy and so many eatery’s restaurants you name it. It’s a pretty prime location. And one of the prettiest parks in Toronto Riverdale park. It takes 25-30min by bus to go downtown.
Accessibility: There is a big flight of stairs up to the apartment with a handrail. There's a big window in your bedroom, and all over the apartment (as shown in the photos) I like to burn incenses, candles, and make this home a really cozy place where you can recharge and also have fun.
About me: I’m a 32 year old, queer nonbinary, GNC folk from the Philippines. I’ve been calling Toronto home for 7years now. I am in the arts scene, I make music and I Dj and I work part time serving/barista. That being said, there will be music playing in the house(being fully transparent) but I am very cooperative and mindful of my space. I’d love if all can share the living room space to be creative and also relax. I like to keep the space tidy and clean and smells good. And I am very easy to talk to and very approachable. I’m trying to eat vegan but I don’t mind if you eat meat :) I’d love to have healthy communication in the space as well. Also I don’t smoke but I’m very 420 friendly
Our living space: With my lifestyle, I’m truly rarely home but when I am home I like to relax and enjoy my space, I probably would just stay in my room sometimes but I’d also love to use the living room to unwind. Previous tenants used the living room as their office so I was not able to appreciate the space and use it as they work from home. I don’t usually have people over but when I do it’d be one or two and we would love to socialize if you’re down to it if not that’s cool too. We are all professionals with work so we're never up very late. For the most part I enjoy a quiet living environment and making it somewhere I can be productive (with my music) and recharge.
Pets: landlord is open to pets as long as pet is not loud and don’t mess up the apartment. Although I am allergic to cats. I just need the dog to be cleaned after to. Is all <3
What we’re looking for: We’re looking for someone with similar expectations and responsibilities, someone who is in the industry of the arts as well, if not then someone who is open to it. Who is friendly and clean and thoughtful of our shared living space.
Who can help me turn the living room into a cute little haven for creating and relaxing
BIPOC folks to the front <3
PS :
-Couples are welcome so we can split the rent in 3! The room is big enough <3
-I can teach you Tagalog
-FREE PALESTINE
-ACAB
-ANTI-CAPITALIST
-✊✊✊✊
-photos of the living room is from previous previous tenants before me and current roommates(that’s moving out) and I wish to make it look like this again. Very open to suggestions <3
If you are interested, please send me a message with some information about yourself and anything you think is important or relevant. Thank you
