Title: Bedroom available in a shared 2-bedroom apartment
Description:
SEEKING ROOMMATE FOR APRIL 1 ***OFFERING*** UNIT: 1 bedroom in 2 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment. You'll have your own room. Corner unit, west north facing, 900 sqft with balcony, dishwasher in unit, laundry available in the building, access to a storage locker for extra price, parking space available for extra price. Room is unfurnished or semi-furnished ( white couch in the first pic may stay in the room if required). Preferences: male roommate – LGBTQ+ friendly
AVAILABLE DATE: April 1st (could potentially move in a bit before if needed)
PRICE: $1500 including hydro bill, internet, and TV.
LOCATION: Davisville and Mt Pleasant. Buses 11, 28 and 75 will take you to subway station within a few minutes. Davisville subway is also 9 min away by foot.
AC: No central AC
RENTAL TERMS: I am the primary tenant and lease holder, planning to stay in the apartment for long-term. As such, I want to sublet an available room for 12-18 months only. No extension possible. First and last rent required ahead of time, Rent is to be paid MONTH TO MONTH after.
RENT CONTROL: Rent increases for this unit are capped at the annual provincial guideline because this unit was lived in before November 15, 2018.
REQUIRED DOCUMENTS: AAA applicants only with credit rating over 700. Must have two references. Proof of ID, Income Verification
ABOUT ME: 40-year-old extrovert European professional male immigrant, with keen interest in sciences, healthcare, aviation, 80s music, travelling, ..., currently doing his PhD and working in academia and healthcare. My current roommate is moving out, so I'm looking for someone to come and join the awesome space I have! I would like to find a flatmate with whom I would get along, share dinners occasionally, chat, feel like at home. I am clean and organized, and I would like to keep apartment like that all the time. While my future flatmate will not be able to have big parties as all the neighbours are quiet, they may be able to host occasionally and have friends over. You will have to be pet friendly (I have a dog staying here often with me). I absolutely love this apartment, it has the most stunning view, facing midtown (so no direct Sun until late afternoons in summer which helps with heat), and I would like to share this special place with someone similar to me in interests and ability to keep the place as it is now – warm, cozy, clean and safe. During the week I'm either working (3 days away) or at home. In summer I am off completely from work, so I spent many days at home or I travel. On the weekends I host sometimes or go out with friends. I often use the common space for cooking, TV watching, hosting friends for drinks or a dinner party.
If interested, please DM me and we can chat and take it from there? Thanks

Title: Large 1 bedroom - High Park / Swansea
Description:
Welcome to your new home in the sought-after High Park/Swansea neighbourhood of Toronto! This charming one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience. Nestled in a cozy 5-plex, it provides a warm, community feel.
As you step inside, you'll find a well-appointed kitchen, perfect for cooking up your favorite meals. The living space is inviting, ideal for relaxation and personal time. The bedroom is a comfortable retreat after a long day.
For your convenience, the building includes laundry facilities in the basement. If you have a car, off-street parking is available for an additional $100 per month.
Priced at $2,200 monthly, this rental includes all utilities, making budgeting easier for you.
Location is key, and this apartment shines with its proximity to essential amenities. You're within walking distance to the subway and streetcar, making commuting a breeze. Enjoy leisurely strolls to Bloor West Village, where shopping, restaurants, and gyms await. And for those quick getaways or commutes, you're just minutes from the Gardiner Expressway and Lakeshore.
Embrace the vibrant lifestyle that this High Park/Swansea gem has to offer!

Title: 392 Sherbourne Street - Sherwood Apartments Apartment for Rent
Description: Welcome to Sherwood Apartments, situated in an established neighbourhood, close to everything downtown Toronto has to offer. You're right in the heart of it all here. Walk your dog to Allan Gardens to enjoy life off the leash in the dog park. Get your groceries at the giant Loblaws at the former Maple Leaf Gardens. Catch a concert at the Phoenix. Your new home is located within walking distance of Ryerson and George Brown College, St. Michael's Hospital, Eaton Centre and schools. The TTC is steps from your door and Sherbourne, College, and Wellesley subway stations are all just minutes away.Your renovated rental apartment features a spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, chocolate parquet floors, and upgraded bathrooms. Enjoy stunning views of the city from your private balcony. You'll love the convenience of on-site laundry facilities and fully-equipped fitness facilities. You'll have peace of mind thanks to our on-site management and maintenance team and monitored security cameras. Living downtown doesn't mean you or your friends have to worry about hunting for parking. There are dedicated visitor parking spaces for your guests and assigned parking available for you. All the shopping and entertainment options of Eglinton Town Centre and Eglinton Square are minutes away as well. Title: Rental Annex 2 BR Lovely Apartment with back yard and parking
Description: Lovely Annex Duplex on wonderful street with wonderful neighbours. 509 Brunswick Avenue. Lower duplex unit on main and lower floor with front porch and terrific decked backyard. An oasis in the city. I am often surprised as to how quiet this little part of the city is. Totally upgraded unit with newer forced air gas furnace and air conditioning. Full laundry room with lots of storage. working fireplace on main level and gas fireplace on lower level. Open concept kitchen with large sliding doors. Kitchen/dining area spill out to newly decked back yard with lots of greenery. Great access to Bloor Street and the newly evolving Dupont street with Loblaws, Farm Boy, Creeds, LCBO, Shoppers, Hardware...all within 2-5 minutes. Quick access to walking/hiking trials around Winston Churchill Park/Castle Loma. Excellent Jean Sebelius Park about 15 houses south. A hub of activity for everyone winter and summer. Very quick access to subway at Dupont and Spadina. Excellent neighbours all around as well. Free standing house with 1 front parking. $4150 plus utilities. Additional photos available

Description: Lord Dufferin Apartments offers stylish, renovated apartments in Liberty Village's west end. Packed with must-have on-site amenities and boasting a transit score of 100, these apartments will help you enhance your Toronto living experience. Offering pet friendly bachelor, 1 and 2 bedroom suites, you'll love the earthy tones and contemporary finishes outfitting these cozy apartments. The rental suites at Lord Dufferin Apartments feature dishwashers, balconies, and open-concept layouts, while our friendly on-site management and concierge staff address your maintenance needs and secure your peace of mind. Residents also enjoy a gym, laundry facilities, storage room with lockers, and party room all on-site; while just outside you'll find a cozy swimming pool and lounge area, plus a personal dog park for resident use. There's no shortage of amenities in Liberty Village, and Lord Dufferin Apartments puts you walking distance from some of its best. Take your workout outdoors with the paved path along Lake Ontario just steps from your door, or spend a day at the CNE, just as close by. With TTC bus and streetcar stops at your door, including 24-hour options on Queen Street, easy access to the Gardiner Expressway and QEW, and the Exhibition GO Station just minutes away, the entire city of Toronto is at your fingertips. Lord Dufferin Apartments is a Certified Rental Building and offers affordable rental living in the heart of one of Toronto's most vibrant neighbourhoods. Title: Seeking Bachelor or 1 Bedroom Apartment
Description:
I am an older, hybrid executive gentleman and professional in the insurance industry, now seeking either a bachelor or 1 bedroom apartment in a very clean, quiet, professional environment.
Going on 7 years at my current address, I am a single non-smoker, do not have dogs or pets.
It is extremely important to me, that I find a residence where there are other hard working and professional, quiet individuals like myself, who simply wish to live in peace. No parties, smoking, drugs etc.
Did I say clean?!!
I'm open to various locations in the GTA, but my preference is central, or south Etobicoke, the west end of Toronto etc. Also looking for something close to the Go Train line to Union.
I'm looking for a self-contained unit, no basements, and wish to be solo.
I'm forecasting a leave/move in date for May 1st, although I would certainly consider earlier.
Feel free to reach out, but serious leads only please.

Title: Palmerston-Little Italy! 246 Montrose Avenue 1Bed/1Bath $2700
Description: Hey there, potential Toronto rental dweller! Have we got one of the hottest 1-bedroom pads in Little Italy to ever hit the market. It's so hot, even the dust bunnies have a warm and fuzzy feeling. We have Hardwood floors galore, because who needs wall-to-wall shag carpeting? It's not the '70s; we've moved on. There is also Ensuite laundry, so you can give your socks a spa day. And a dishwasher, because arguing over who's doing the dishes is so last season. Feast your eyes on our private backyard - big enough to host a family of squirrels or, you know, just you. A deck so massive, it's practically its own suburb. Barbecue parties? More like deck dance-offs! Who needs parking when you've got College Street as your playground? Coffee, groceries, and bar hopping - all just a casual stroll away. And when I say stroll, I mean strut. You're in Little Italy; you've got to have style.
